Objective
To obtain entry-level position in finance. 
Education
Bachelor degree in finance (2017) from Sultan Qaboos University, with 
GPA of (3.21).
Secondary Certificate, Omar Bin Alkhatab High School, literary 
2012/2013. With average (83%).
Related coursework
Intermediate Finance, Principles Of Investments, Capital Structure 
And Budgeting, Investment Analysis And Portfolio Management, 
Risk Management And Insurance, Financial Analysis And 
Valuation, Working Capital Management, Financial Modeling, 
Financial Markets And Institutions, Project Finance And Evaluation, 
Mergers And Acquisition, and Multinational Financial Management. 
Experience
Training in Bank Muscat Firq Industrial branch  (June-July 2016). 
-Processing banks cheques.
-Dealing with customers.
On job training at Ministry Of Finance (temporary contract) starting on 
15th of October 2017 until 15th of October 2018, in Treasury and 
Accounts Department. Using common financial system to:
-Inserting paid vouchers in different currencies.
-Inserting received vouchers in local currency. 
-Preparing reconciliation vouchers.
-Making reconciliation to avoid differences between book and bank   
accounts. 
-Issuing paid vouchers for different institutions. Computer Skills
Application Software: Microsoft Office Programs, Movie Maker, Adobe 
Photoshop.
Activities & Accomplishments
Participated in "Financial Analysis Challenge" competition, that 
arranged by Muscat Securities Market, and got second class.
-Analyzing and forecasting Bank Muscat financial statements. 
Did comprehensive report for "Investment Analysis And Portfolio 
Management" course that related to portfolio investment.
Dean list in spring 2017 Distinction with Honor.
Attending "Feasibility Study" workshop, at Sultan Qaboos University 
(spring 2017). 
I have volunteering works in the university with my team which is care 
about genetic blood diseases and in the society with my football team.
